name: ASMRbox
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. s. m. r. box
des:
It is a skill that can repeatedly play the ASMR sound recorded in this skill.

Recommended for people like this!
・ People who want to hear soothing sounds and ASMR sounds that make the brain chill
・ People who want to work while listening to environmental sounds during study or work
・ People who want to be healed by listening to ASMR

To get started, say "Ask, ASMR box".

You can play all the sound sources in the skill by charging ASMR Premium.

If you want to cancel your bill, say "Cancel ASMR Premium".

If you want to play the ASMR sound source recorded in the skill, after calling the ASMR sound, try saying "Play the sound of XXX" from all 30 sound sources.
01. Mechanical pencil(free)
02. Sharpen rice
03. Lighter
04. Book
05. Keyboard
06. Waterfall
07. Shredder
08. Cookie
09. Sausage
10. Ramen
11. River
12. Potato chips
13. Forest
14. Carbonated
15. Scissors
16. Apple
17. Fried rice
18. Curtain
19. Paper with a pencil
20. Mouse click
21.Switch
22.Tissue
23.Beads
24.Whistling
25.Sandstorm
26.Toothbrush
27.Clap Hands
28.Door
29.Faucet
30.PC fan

If you want to play the sound source randomly, try saying "Play the sound of random".
If you want to play the free sound source as a trial, please say "Play the sound of free".

You can end at any time with "Alexa, Stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
